assertions.title: Strong authentication methods are enabled for user accounts
assertions.rationale: Strong authentication prevents unauthorized access to email and collaboration services.

assertions.title: Multi-factor authentication is enforced for all user accounts
assertions.rationale: MFA significantly reduces the risk of account compromise and unauthorized access.

assertions.title: Conditional access policies implement risk-based authentication
assertions.rationale: Risk-based conditional access provides adaptive security based on user behavior and device trust.

assertions.title: Guest access management implements proper external user controls
assertions.rationale: Proper guest access controls prevent unauthorized external access to collaboration resources.

assertions.title: Anti-spam protection is enabled with comprehensive filtering
assertions.rationale: Anti-spam protection prevents malicious emails from reaching users and reduces security risks.

assertions.title: Anti-malware protection scans all email attachments and links
assertions.rationale: Anti-malware protection prevents malicious attachments and links from compromising user systems.

assertions.title: Phishing protection detects and blocks phishing attempts
assertions.rationale: Phishing protection prevents social engineering attacks and credential theft.

assertions.title: Email encryption is enabled for sensitive communications
assertions.rationale: Email encryption protects sensitive data in transit and at rest.

assertions.title: Data loss prevention policies are enforced across email and collaboration
assertions.rationale: DLP policies prevent unauthorized sharing of sensitive data and ensure compliance.

assertions.title: Automatic data classification is enabled for emails and documents
assertions.rationale: Data classification ensures appropriate security controls are applied based on data sensitivity.

assertions.title: File sharing controls restrict external sharing appropriately
assertions.rationale: File sharing controls prevent unauthorized external access to corporate documents.

assertions.title: Permission management implements granular access controls
assertions.rationale: Granular permissions ensure users only have access to resources they need.

assertions.title: Comprehensive audit logging is enabled for all activities
assertions.rationale: Audit logging provides visibility into user activities and supports compliance requirements.

assertions.title: eDiscovery capabilities enable comprehensive search and collection
assertions.rationale: eDiscovery capabilities support legal proceedings and regulatory investigations.

assertions.title: Advanced threat protection is enabled for sophisticated attacks
assertions.rationale: Advanced threat protection detects and prevents sophisticated attacks that bypass traditional security controls.

assertions.title: Behavioral analytics detect anomalies in user behavior
assertions.rationale: Behavioral analytics enable detection of compromised accounts and insider threats.

assertions.title: Administrative access management implements proper privileged access controls
assertions.rationale: Proper admin access controls prevent unauthorized administrative actions and privilege escalation.

assertions.title: Mobile device management is enabled for all corporate devices
assertions.rationale: MDM ensures mobile devices accessing corporate email are properly managed and secured.

assertions.title: App protection policies enforce data protection on mobile devices
assertions.rationale: App protection policies ensure corporate data is protected on mobile devices.

assertions.title: Third-party app security requires approval for all integrations
assertions.rationale: Third-party app approval prevents unauthorized access to corporate data through unvetted applications.

assertions.title: API security requires authentication and authorization for all endpoints
assertions.rationale: API security prevents unauthorized access to email and collaboration services through APIs.

assertions.title: Security incident response procedures are defined and tested
assertions.rationale: Incident response procedures ensure rapid and effective response to security incidents.

assertions.title: Safe Links and Attachments scanning is enabled for URL and attachment protection
assertions.rationale: Safe Links and Attachments provide real-time protection against malicious URLs and attachments in emails.

assertions.title: Email authentication (SPF, DKIM, DMARC) is properly configured and monitored
assertions.rationale: Email authentication prevents domain spoofing and ensures email authenticity and integrity.

assertions.title: Quarantine management implements secure handling and user notifications
assertions.rationale: Proper quarantine management ensures malicious emails are contained while allowing legitimate emails to be released.

assertions.title: Automated email archiving is enabled for compliance and long-term storage
assertions.rationale: Email archiving ensures compliance with regulatory requirements and provides long-term data retention capabilities.

assertions.title: Email backup and recovery procedures are implemented and tested
assertions.rationale: Backup and recovery procedures ensure business continuity and data availability in case of system failures.

assertions.title: Data encryption at rest is enabled for all stored emails and attachments
assertions.rationale: Encryption at rest protects sensitive data from unauthorized access even if storage systems are compromised.

assertions.title: TLS/SSL encryption in transit is enforced for all email communications
assertions.rationale: Encryption in transit prevents interception of email communications and protects data during transmission.

assertions.title: Automated data retention policies are enforced across all email and collaboration content
assertions.rationale: Data retention policies ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and reduce data storage costs.

assertions.title: Legal hold capabilities are implemented for data preservation during legal proceedings
assertions.rationale: Legal hold capabilities ensure data preservation for legal proceedings and regulatory investigations.

assertions.title: Right to erasure capabilities enable data deletion and export for data subject requests
assertions.rationale: Right to erasure capabilities ensure compliance with GDPR and other privacy regulations for data subject rights.

assertions.title: External sharing policies implement granular controls for external collaboration
assertions.rationale: Granular external sharing controls prevent unauthorized data exposure while enabling legitimate collaboration.

assertions.title: Guest user lifecycle management implements complete provisioning and deprovisioning controls
assertions.rationale: Complete guest user lifecycle management ensures proper access control and prevents orphaned accounts.

assertions.title: Real-time collaboration security protects live editing and collaborative features
assertions.rationale: Real-time collaboration security ensures data integrity and access control during live editing sessions.

assertions.title: Automated compliance reporting is enabled for regulatory and internal requirements
assertions.rationale: Automated compliance reporting reduces manual effort and ensures consistent reporting for regulatory requirements.

assertions.title: Retention policy enforcement is automated across all content types
assertions.rationale: Automated retention policy enforcement ensures consistent compliance with data retention requirements.

assertions.title: Continuous security monitoring is enabled for all email and collaboration activities
assertions.rationale: Continuous security monitoring enables early detection of security threats and suspicious activities.

assertions.title: Automated incident detection is enabled for security events and anomalies
assertions.rationale: Automated incident detection enables rapid response to security threats and reduces manual monitoring overhead.

assertions.title: Threat intelligence integration provides real-time threat indicators and IOCs
assertions.rationale: Threat intelligence integration enhances detection capabilities with external threat indicators and IOCs.

assertions.title: Role-based access control is implemented with least privilege principles
assertions.rationale: RBAC implementation ensures administrative access is properly controlled and follows least privilege principles.

assertions.title: Comprehensive administrative auditing tracks all admin actions and configuration changes
assertions.rationale: Administrative auditing provides accountability and traceability for all administrative actions and changes.

assertions.title: Secure configuration management implements version control and change tracking
assertions.rationale: Secure configuration management ensures proper control and tracking of system configurations and changes.

assertions.title: Device compliance policies enforce security requirements for mobile device access
assertions.rationale: Device compliance policies ensure mobile devices meet security requirements before accessing corporate resources.

assertions.title: Device encryption requirements are enforced for all mobile devices
assertions.rationale: Device encryption protects corporate data on mobile devices from unauthorized access and data theft.

assertions.title: Remote wipe capabilities are enabled for lost or compromised devices
assertions.rationale: Remote wipe capabilities protect corporate data on lost or compromised mobile devices.

assertions.title: OAuth application management monitors and controls third-party application access
assertions.rationale: OAuth application management prevents unauthorized access through third-party applications and ensures proper permission controls.

assertions.title: Connector security implements access controls for data connectors and integrations
assertions.rationale: Connector security ensures data integrity and access control for external system integrations.

assertions.title: Digital forensics capabilities are available for security incident investigation
assertions.rationale: Digital forensics capabilities enable thorough investigation of security incidents and evidence collection.

assertions.title: Evidence preservation procedures ensure digital evidence integrity during investigations
assertions.rationale: Evidence preservation procedures ensure digital evidence integrity and admissibility in legal proceedings.

assertions.title: Business continuity planning ensures service availability during security incidents
assertions.rationale: Business continuity planning ensures minimal service disruption and rapid recovery during security incidents.
